org.treetank.io.combined

Class CombinedWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.io.combined.CombinedWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBackendReader, IBackendWriter

    public class CombinedWriter
extends Object
implements IBackendWriter
    Combined Writer for writing to a first and a second writer.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
